title: mono spaced slab serif face
content:
Having trouble finding this one. Anyone know it?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [clothing-3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725005340/http:/typophile.com/files/clothing-3.jpg) | 139.7 KB |
author: Olivaris

comments.content:
Could be as simple as [Courier](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725005340/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/courier)...  
Non-angled samples: [http://www.getplenty.com/about/in-house-brands](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725005340/http:/www.getplenty.com/about/in-house-brands "http://www.getplenty.com/about/in-house-brands")  
- [http://www.getplenty.com/media/ribbon.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725005340/http:/www.getplenty.com/media/ribbon.jpg "http://www.getplenty.com/media/ribbon.jpg")  
- [http://www.getplenty.com/media/ribbonluxe.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725005340/http:/www.getplenty.com/media/ribbonluxe.jpg "http://www.getplenty.com/media/ribbonluxe.jpg")

EDIT: Renko confirming the 'Courier' track and judging by the /i dot shape, could be [Courier 10-pitch](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725005340/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/courier-10-pitch).

Thanks guys.

Didn't think it could be that obvious! Looks like 10 pitch to me.
